properties.headline: Flood Warning issued December 31 at 8:25AM CST by NWS North Platte NE
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Nebraska...

North Platte River at Lewellen affecting Garden and Keith Counties.

.The formation of ice on the North Platte river near and at Lewellen has
caused river levels to run high. High river levels from ice jamming is
expected to persist the rest of the week. Fluctuations of a foot are
possible with the ice jam.

The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The North Platte River at Lewellen.
* until further notice.
* At  6:45 AM Tuesday the stage was 7.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 8.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to remain near flood stage this
morning through Friday.
* Impact...At 8.0 feet...Minor flood stage. Overflow and high water
table levels may cause seepage and flooding of basements and crawl
spaces near and along the river.
* Flood history...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.0 feet
on Jun 7 2017.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive your vehicle into areas where water covers the roadway.
The water depth may be too great to allow your car to cross safely
and the road beneath may not be intact. Vehicles caught in rising
waters should be abandoned quickly.
